testrail._comment: only project_id is optional as it is thought to be used if one needs to create a test runs before running the tests and update it

absolute_data._comment: While testing one needs to have some pre-structured data to proceed, this may differ in different, log those data here and absolutly try to avoid such approach

url._comment: baseurl is required and basic auth username and password is optional if they do not exist then no need to include
